amendment.description: To authorize certain additional appropriations for the Center for Cultural and Technical Interchange Between East and West.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1187 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1187 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Akaka to Amendment SA 1136. (consideration: CR S9191-9194; text: CR S9193) To authorize certain additional appropriations for the Center for Cultural and Technical Interchange Between East and West.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1187 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Akaka to Amendment SA 1136.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1187 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
